entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
